search.title: Search Xinference Knowledge Base

about.title: About FAQ
about.subtitle: An intelligent FAQ system designed to help you get the most out of Xinference, the open-source platform for running AI model inference.

whatIs.title: What is this?
whatIs.description1: The Xinference FAQ is an AI-powered system that helps users find answers to their questions about Xinference. Whether you're trying to install Xinference, deploy models, troubleshoot issues, or understand advanced features, this system can provide instant, accurate answers.
whatIs.description2: The system searches through multiple sources including official documentation, GitHub issues, and source code to provide comprehensive answers with proper source attribution. Each response includes a confidence score and links to the original sources for verification.

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Powerful capabilities to help you succeed with Xinference

docSearch.title: Documentation Search
docSearch.description: Search through official Xinference documentation with semantic understanding to find exactly what you need.

githubIntegration.title: GitHub Integration
githubIntegration.description: Access real solutions from GitHub issues and source code to solve problems faced by the community.

aiAnswers.title: AI-Powered Answers
aiAnswers.description: Get intelligent responses generated by AI that combines information from multiple sources for comprehensive answers.

communityKnowledge.title: Community Knowledge
communityKnowledge.description: Benefit from the collective knowledge of the Xinference community through curated questions and answers.

sourceAttribution.title: Source Attribution
sourceAttribution.description: Every answer includes clear source attribution so you can verify information and dive deeper when needed.

fastReliable.title: Fast & Reliable
fastReliable.description: Get instant answers with confidence scores and response times, so you can trust the information you receive.

step1.title: Ask Your Question
step1.description: Type your question about Xinference in natural language. The system understands context and can handle complex queries.

step2.title: Search & Analyze
step2.description: The agent searches through documentation, GitHub issues, and source code using semantic search to find the most relevant information.

step3.title: Get Your Answer
step3.description: Receive a comprehensive answer with source attribution, confidence score, and links to dive deeper into the topic.

officialDocs.title: Official Documentation
officialDocs.description: Complete documentation from inference.readthedocs.io including installation guides, API references, and tutorials.

githubIssues.title: GitHub Issues
githubIssues.description: Real problems and solutions from the Xinference GitHub repository, including bug reports, feature requests, and community discussions.

sourceCode.title: Source Code
sourceCode.description: Direct access to the Xinference source code for implementation details and advanced configuration options.

about.title: About FAQ
about.description: Xinference FAQ is an AI-powered question-answering system specifically designed to provide technical support and help for Xinference users.
features: Intelligent Q&A system powered by DeepSeek AI
